name: Bonsai
body:
#Bonsai

##A framework for e-mail design

Hi i'm Samuel Gazave. In my curent job i build a lot of e-mail campaigns and as html email can be tricky, i biult a tool to help me create solid templates and newsletters very fast. It comes with a grid system and pre-built elements i use the most in my creations.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
